title: Biological Qubits & Quantum Sensors Atlas (v2.2.2)
description: A curated atlas of quantum-coherent and optical systems operating in, or compatible with, biological environments (in vitro, in cellulo, in vivo). Version 2.2.2 provides 250 systems (balanced dataset) with comprehensive provenance tracking, optical coverage, and quality control validation. Features include: automated ETL pipeline, complete provenance tracking (SHA256 checksums), balanced family distribution, optimized for ML training. This version extends v1.2.1 (66 systems) and v2.0/v2.1 with additional literature mining and FPbase integration.
notes: Version 2.2.2 includes: (1) 250 systems (balanced dataset); (2) 100% optical coverage; (3) 30 families represented; (4) Complete provenance tracking (DOIs for all entries); (5) Training datasets: TRAINING_TABLE_v2_2_2_full.csv, TRAINING_TABLE_v2_2_2_balanced.csv; (6) Family weight distribution for ML balancing; (7) SHA256 integrity checksums. This version extends v1.2.1 (66 systems) with major data boost for machine learning applications.
